languages.text: "Как смеешь ты, Изгой, говорить со мной в подобном тоне? Я не обязан перед тобой оправдываться. И тем более доказывать свою невиновность!"

traits.locale_text: "Как смеешь ты, Изгой, говорить со мной в подобном тоне? Я не обязан перед тобой оправдываться. И тем более доказывать свою невиновность!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
languages.original_text: "Как смеешь ты, Изгой, говорить со мной в подобном тоне? Я не обязан перед тобой оправдываться. И тем более доказывать свою невиновность!"

traits.locale_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Cómo te atreves a hablarme en ese tono, proscrita? No tengo ninguna obligación de justificar mis actos ante ti. ¡Y mucho menos de defender mi inocencia!».
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo te atreves a hablarme en ese tono, proscrita? No tengo ninguna obligación de justificar mis actos ante ti. ¡Y mucho menos de defender mi inocencia!».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「よくもそんな口の利き方ができるものだな、追放者よ。君に対して弁明する義務は私にはない。ましてや自らの潔白を訴える必要もない！」
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: 「よくもそんな口の利き方ができるものだな、追放者よ。君に対して弁明する義務は私にはない。ましてや自らの潔白を訴える必要もない！」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你怎么敢用这种语气对我说话，流浪者？我没有义务在你面前解释什么，更没有义务证明我的清白！”
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么敢用这种语气对我说话，流浪者？我没有义务在你面前解释什么，更没有义务证明我的清白！”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Comment osez-vous me parler de la sorte, Errante ? Je n'ai aucune obligation de me justifier devant vous. Encore moins de clamer mon innocence ! »
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment osez-vous me parler de la sorte, Errante ? Je n'ai aucune obligation de me justifier devant vous. Encore moins de clamer mon innocence ! »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, einen solchen Ton mit mir anzuschlagen, Ausgestoßene? Ich bin nicht verpflichtet, mich vor Euch zu rechtfertigen. Geschweige denn meine Unschuld zu beteuern!"
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, einen solchen Ton mit mir anzuschlagen, Ausgestoßene? Ich bin nicht verpflichtet, mich vor Euch zu rechtfertigen. Geschweige denn meine Unschuld zu beteuern!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ne cüretle benimle bu şekilde konuşursun Yurtsuz? Bırak masumiyetimi beyan etmeyi, sana kendimi savunmak zorunda bile değilim."
languages.original_text: "How dare you take that tone with me, Outcast? I am not obliged to justify myself before you. Let alone protest my innocence!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne cüretle benimle böyle bir tonda konuşursun Yurtsuz? Bırak masumiyetimi beyan etmeyi, senin önünde kendimi savunmak zorunda bile değilim."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
